dialogueLines.line: Well, this certainly doesn't seem like the venue for the rap battle competition.
dialogueLines.speaker: mom

dialogueLines.line: And just who might you be?
dialogueLines.speaker: mom

dialogueLines.line: Hmph, I suppose it's only natural that a second dimensional savage like you wouldn't recognize me.
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: You better watch your tongue before I melt you down and turn your remains into a snow globe.
dialogueLines.speaker: mom

dialogueLines.line: I am PRIS-ma, a distinguished being from the third dimension.
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: Out of boredom, I decided to gather a number of lowly second dimension folk together into my dimension and watch you all fight your pointless musical battles.
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: And what would it take to convince you to bring me back to my dimension?
dialogueLines.speaker: mom

dialogueLines.line: Well, even an inferior 2D being like you should know at this point.
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: In that case, allow me to prove that two dimensions is plenty enough.
dialogueLines.speaker: mom
